resultsSubtitle: Different tasks. Consistent quality. Results from various properties and requirements.
resultsFormTitle: Let’s discuss your request within the next 20 minutes!
name: Name
reviewsSubtitle: Genuine feedback from customers who appreciate our cooperation, reliability, and quality.
faqSubtitle: Still unclear about something? Contact us - we’ll be happy to advise you.
homeDescription: Professional cleaning services for businesses and private clients. Reliable maintenance, move-out, and specialized cleaning - customized, transparent, and professional.
catTitle: For professional requirements and private needs
catSubtitle: From regular maintenance to specialized services – we clean reliably, systematically, and tailored to the property, usage, and requirements.
formSubtitle: Each property is assessed individually – depending on its use, condition, and scope of services. Fill out the form, and we will get back to you promptly to briefly discuss your request.
stage1Title: Which services are you interested in?
stage1Subtitle: Choose the type of cleaning that suits your needs. You can also select multiple services.
stage2Subtitle: Specify the property size, mention special requirements, and upload photos if needed.
stage3Subtitle: Fill in your contact details – we will get back to you as soon as possible.
stage3Footer: By submitting the form, you accept our [Privacy Policy].
successSubtitle: We are reviewing your request and will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactsSubtitle: Have questions or need a quote? We’d be happy to hear from you.
